definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="random_var">random_var</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:random_var</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:random_var</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Organicessence</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
